explains: prep. 除非；不包括；除……以外
v. 阻拦（bar 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: barring gear 盘车装置；曲轴变位传动装置；曲柄移位装置

sentences.en: Barring accidents, we should arrive on time.
sentences.cn: 除非有意外情况，我们应可按时到达。

sentences.en: Two police officers were barring her exit.
sentences.cn: 两名警察挡着她的出路。

sentences.en: We should finish by tonight, barring hold-ups.
sentences.cn: 倘若没有延误，我们应该在今晚完工。
